short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Playback of ABR streams (HLS, MPEG-DASH and Smooth Streaming) in your Chrome browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension you have the ability to play HLS, MPEG-DASH and Smooth Streaming streams directly in your browser. The extension is built on the Eyevinn HTML Player
